problem.p: A wheel of radius \(R\) is rolling without slipping along a level surface with center-of-mass velocity \(\vec{\mathbf{V}} _{cm}\) (with magnitude \(v_{CM}\)) . What is speed of a point on the rim with respect to the ground in each of the four positions A, B, C, and D as shown in the figure below?

Speed of point A is:
Zero \( \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} v_{CM}\) \( \sqrt{2} v_{CM}\) \( 2 v_{CM}\)
